name: Set Gmail Tab Colors
description: Sets unique background colors for each tab of the new Gmail tabs. NEW rounded corners option makes tabs look like real file folder tabs! Fully annotated CSS makes it easy to choose your own colors.
additional_info:
1.1 Updated to accommodate the taller tabs of the "Comfortable" and "Cozy" Gmail views. 4/16/2014
1.2 Added option to round the top corners of the tabs like real file folder labels. Tabs are rounded by default. Annotations show what rules to remove if you don't want them rounded.
1.2.1 Fixed too-heavy borders.
